item.title: 英国通胀为何如此之高及其对利率的影响
item.description: 尽管大流行病后爆发的通货膨胀在发达国家的大部分地区都有所缓解，但在西方主要经济体中，英国的物价增长速度仍然是最高的。【原文：While a post-pandemic burst of inflation has abated across much of the developed world, the UK is still stuck with the highest price growth among big Western economies.】

item.title: 伦敦住房租金自大流行病以来首次下降
item.description: 官方数据显示，自2021年英国摆脱科维德限制以来，伦敦的私人住房租金在7月份首次走低，这表明首都的生活成本危机正在开始缓解。【原文：Private housing rents in London edged lower in July for the first time since 2021 when the UK was emerging from Covid restrictions, a sign that the capital’s cost-of-living crisis is starting to ease, according to official data.】

item.title: 投资者重投对冲基金，资金流入创十年新高
item.description: 投资者以十年来最快的速度向对冲基金投入资金，希望动荡的市场能带来超额回报。【原文：Investors have been pouring money into hedge funds at the fastest rate in a decade, hoping volatile markets will produce outsized returns.】

item.title: 基金以冬季以来最快速度削减对欧洲天然气的多头押注
item.description: 基金削减了对欧洲天然气价格将以去年冬季以来最快速度上涨的投机性多头押注，这表明人们越来越相信，随着贸易商在供暖季节来临前加强囤积，对供应的担忧将有所缓解。【原文：Funds cut speculative long bets that European gas prices will rise at the fastest pace since last winter, signaling growing conviction that supply worries are set to ease as traders ramp up stockpiling ahead of the heating season.】

item.title: 黑客入侵 85 万个比利时 Orange 公司客户账户
item.description: Orange SA 的比利时业务部门称，黑客获取了 85 万个客户账户的数据，这是今年针对这家法国电信公司的第三次重大网络攻击。【原文：Orange SA’s Belgian business said that hackers gained access to data from 850,000 customer accounts, in the third major cyberattack targeting the French telecommunications firm this year.】

item.title: 人工智能正在虹吸风险投资资金，引发泡沫破裂之说
item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，凯特-克拉克（Kate Clark）将报道最新的风险投资统计数据，该数据再次表明人工智能初创企业在资金募集方面占据主导地位。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Kate Clark reports on the latest venture capital investing statistics, which again show artificial intelligence startups are dominating the fundraising.】

item.title: 受制于国内市场，中国电动汽车冠军正走向世界
item.description: 我是恩达-柯兰，驻华盛顿的经济记者。今天我们关注中国对外投资的一个片断。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Enda Curran, an economics correspondent in Washington. Today we’re looking at a slice of China’s outbound investment. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 欧洲 DHL 快递公司总裁称全球贸易 "大到不能倒
item.description: 欧洲 DHL 快递公司首席执行官迈克-帕拉（Mike Parra）正在实时观察美国提高关税后全球货物贸易的变化。【原文：Mike Parra, the CEO of DHL Express Europe, is watching in real time how global goods trade is shifting as the US increases tariffs.】

item.title: 甲骨文借助与 OpenAI 和 Nvidia 的重大交易扭转云计算业务局面
item.description: 甲骨文公司的拉里-埃里森（Larry Ellison）曾经对云计算的概念嗤之以鼻，他在2008年说，云计算 "完全是胡言乱语"。【原文：Oracle Corp.’s Larry Ellison used to scoff at the idea of cloud computing, saying in 2008 that it was “complete gibberish.”】

item.title: 美国 IPO 市场升温，人工智能和加密货币公司加快计划步伐
item.description: 在今年夏天热火朝天的美国新股发行市场上，首日涨幅达到三位数的公司屡见不鲜，而那些标榜自己与人工智能和加密行业有联系的公司正在加快上市步伐。【原文：Companies touting their artificial intelligence and crypto-sector ties are speeding up their IPO timelines, after triple-digit first-day pops became a regular feature in this summer’s sizzling US market for new issues.】

item.title: 许多人预期的股市大幅回调尚未到来
item.description: 尽管周二出现了震荡，但自 4 月份以来一直推动美国股市大幅回升的论调仍然具有支撑作用，因为推动股市反弹的因素仍然完好无损。【原文：Despite Tuesday’s wobble, the narrative that has been fueling the sharp recovery in US equities since April remains supportive as the drivers of the rally are still intact.】

item.title: 空客飞机订单完成在即，中国航企分食空客飞机
item.description: 中国南方航空股份有限公司（China Southern Airlines Co., 简称 "南航"）和中国国际航空股份有限公司（Air China Ltd.，简称 "国航"）等中国航空公司已开始瓜分500架空客SE喷气机的订单。【原文：China Southern Airlines Co. and Air China Ltd. are among the Chinese airlines that have started dividing up an order of 500 Airbus SE jets in a deal that Beijing is still looking for an opportune time to announce, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 阿达尼单位从全球贷款人处筹集 2.75 亿美元离岸债务
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，阿达尼集团（Adani Group）旗下的两个单位通过两笔外币贷款共筹集了约 2.75 亿美元，这家印度企业集团正继续加大借贷力度。【原文：Two units of Adani Group raised a total of about $275 million through two foreign currency loans as the Indian conglomerate continues to ramp up its borrowing, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 债券交易员在鲍威尔讲话前提高赌注
item.description:
对美联储大幅降息的押注正在增加。【原文：

Bets on a jumbo rate cut from the Fed are mounting.

】

item.title: 英特尔的拯救有赖于作为投资者和推销员的特朗普
item.description: 美国政府计划入股英特尔公司，这将为这家濒临破产的芯片制造商提供一个强大的后盾，尽管未来仍面临着更大的挑战：寻找足够多的付费客户。【原文：A US government plan to take a stake in Intel Corp. would give the ailing chipmaker a powerful backer, even if a bigger challenge still lies ahead: finding enough paying customers.】

item.title: 劳氏公司将以 88 亿美元现金收购基金会大厦
item.description: Lowe's Cos.同意以约 88 亿美元现金收购北美干墙和其他建筑产品分销商 Foundation Building Materials。【原文：Lowe’s Cos. agreed to buy Foundation Building Materials, a North American distributor of drywall and other building products, for about $8.8 billion in cash.】

item.title: 据说蒙牛乳业正在酝酿出售 Aice 冰淇淋品牌的股份
item.description: 知情人士透露，中国蒙牛乳业有限公司正在考虑出售冰淇淋品牌爱思（Aice）约 20% 的少数股权。【原文：China Mengniu Dairy Co. is considering selling a minority stake of about 20% in ice-cream brand Aice, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 印度 "纳亚拉 "号求助于黑暗舰队和俄罗斯石油以求生存
item.description: 印度纳亚拉能源有限公司（Nayara Energy Ltd. ）在遭受欧盟制裁一个月后，正依靠越来越多的暗船队油轮来运输产品，并依靠日益减少的原油进口来维持运营。【原文：One month after being hit by European Union sanctions, India’s Nayara Energy Ltd. is relying on a growing pool of dark-fleet tankers to transport its products, and a narrowing menu of crude imports to keep its operations running.】

item.title: 受科技股下跌影响，新兴市场资产将出现三周来最严重下跌
item.description: 由于美国科技股大跌抑制了对高风险资产的需求，新兴市场股市和货币创下约三周以来的最大跌幅。【原文：Emerging-market stocks and currencies headed for their biggest drop in about three weeks as a selloff in US tech heavyweights curbed demand for riskier assets.】

item.title: 花旗称多年来最大规模的套利交易反弹仍需时日
item.description: 今年以来，买入新兴市场货币兑美元的交易带来了十年来最诱人的回报，花旗银行策略主管认为，至少在短期内，这种交易仍有进一步发展的空间。【原文：Buying emerging-market currencies against the dollar this year has delivered some of the most attractive returns of the decade, and according to Citi’s head of strategy, the trade still has further to run — at least in the short term.】

item.title: StanChart 肯尼亚半年利润因外汇收入暴跌而下降
item.description: 渣打银行肯尼亚有限公司上半年利润下降了五分之一，原因是外汇交易收入骤降，贷款收入减少。【原文：Standard Chartered Bank Kenya Ltd.’s first-half profit declined by a fifth after income from foreign-exchange trading plunged and from loans dipped.】

item.title: 巴菲特效应依然存在，联合健康 8 月业绩飙升
item.description: 巴菲特效应再次被证明是正确的，它刺激了联合健康集团公司（UnitedHealth Group Inc.【原文：The Warren Buffett effect is proving true once again, spurring UnitedHealth Group Inc.’s reversal this month and giving the Dow Jones Industrial Average a push toward its first closing high since last year.】

item.title: 鲍威尔抨击特朗普，全球同行为美联储喝彩
item.description: 本周，各国央行行长齐聚怀俄明州杰克逊霍尔，参加美联储年度会议，他们准备的不仅仅是交换研究论文和欣赏山景，而是为杰罗姆-鲍威尔辩护。【原文：Central bankers gathering in Jackson Hole, Wyoming this week for the Federal Reserve’s annual conference are prepared to go beyond swapping research papers and savoring mountain views — they’re coming to defend Jerome Powell.】

item.title: 荷兰养老金改革波及欧元掉期市场
item.description: 荷兰养老基金系统的全面改革已经对数万亿欧元的掉期市场产生了影响。【原文：An overhaul in the Dutch pension fund system is already having an impact on the multi-trillion euro swaps market.】

item.title: 肯尼亚与中国商谈将美元贷款转换为人民币债务
item.description: 肯尼亚财政部长约翰-姆巴迪（John Mbadi）说，肯尼亚正在与中国谈判，将这个东非国家欠中国最大双边贷款国的美元债务转换成人民币，并延长还款期。【原文：Kenya is in talks with China to convert dollar-denominated debt the East African nation owes its biggest bilateral lender to yuan and extend the repayment period, Treasury Secretary John Mbadi said.】

item.title: 中国人工智能竞赛愈演愈烈，百度营收下滑
item.description: 受经济衰退的影响，百度公司的收入下降，这限制了其在人工智能领域与更大的竞争对手抗衡的能力，也限制了其在新的增长领域取得进展的能力。【原文：Baidu Inc.’s revenue fell, hurt by an economic downturn that’s capping its ability to fight bigger rivals in AI and make inroads in new growth areas.】

item.title: 分析师称印尼意外降息将促进经济增长和市场发展
item.description: 分析师认为，印尼央行意外降息将为国内经济和本地资产提供急需的提振。【原文：The Indonesian central bank’s surprise interest-rate cut would provide the domestic economy and local assets with a much needed boost, according to analysts.】

item.title: 在阿根廷流动性紧缩之际，米莱与顶级银行发生冲突
item.description: 阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）为遏制比索下跌而新实施的流动性措施加剧了该国银行之间的紧张关系。【原文：Newly imposed liquidity measures aimed at containing a nascent peso selloff have stoked tensions between Argentine President Javier Milei and the country’s banks, a sector that was largely aligned with his policy goals but now sees its profitability under threat.】

item.title: 通胀压力持续，冰岛央行停止宽松政策
item.description: 冰岛央行暂停了长达 10 个月的降息行动，原因是担心通胀持续高企。【原文：Iceland’s central bank took a pause from a ten-month long campaign of interest-rate cuts due to worries over sticky inflation.】

item.title: 风险挥之不去，期权交易员看好瑞士法郎走弱
item.description: 由于期权交易商要应对美国的陡峭关税、借贷成本为零以及央行干预的威胁挥之不去，瑞郎正承受着两年多来最大的看跌溢价。【原文：The Swiss franc is carrying its biggest bearish premium in over two years as options traders contend with steep US tariffs, borrowing costs at zero and the lingering threat of central bank intervention.】
